metadata.Title: CVE-2020-24996 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: There is an invalid memory access in the function TextString::~TextString() located in Catalog.cc in Xpdf 4.0.2. It can be triggered by (for example) sending a crafted pdf file to the pdftohtml binary, which allows a remote attacker to cause a Denial of Service (Segmentation fault) or possibly have unspecified other impact.

notes.Note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 mdeslaur> Doesn't look like the same issue is in poppler, there is no Catalog.PageLabels

criterions.comment: ipe package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
xpdf package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
